strings.Value: "By the way, someone promised to smother me with kisses... I'm still waiting!"
"Regongar, what do you think you're doing?!"
[Pull away] "Regongar, stop. Let's not ruin our friendship."
"Regongar, what are you... There are people here!"
[Put your arm around Regongar in return]
"I'd like to spend the night alone with Regongar."
[Leave with Regongar]
{n}Returning to the capital, you, Octavia and Regongar go to the tavern to rest. After a couple of mugs, Regongar pulls out a deck of cards.{/n} "Want to play?"
"A promise is a promise!" {n}The half-orc kisses you on the lips.{/n}
{n}Regongar quickly pulls away his hand and scoots away from you.{/n} "It's just a bit of fun. Ha ha!"
"All right, all right, as you wish! Friends it is then!"
"So what? Are we doing something they don't like, hmm?" {n}The half-orc's hand is stroking your thigh.{/n}
{n}The half-orc clings to you, as his fingers stroke your thigh.{/n}
"Hey, mistress! Another round of drinks, we are dying of thirst here!
"The beer here is good, but there's too many people. Maybe it's time we go somewhere quieter?"
"I think it's high time... Octavia, are you coming?"
"The three of us?" {n}The half-elf laughs as she sizes up you and Regongar.{/n} "I'm liking this evening more and more... {Name}, what about you?"
"I don't think so." {n}The half-elf winks at you provocatively.{/n} "Have fun!"
{n}Octavia winks at you.{/n} "All right. Have fun!"
"Exactly! Come, my ladies — adventures await!"
{n}Regongar reluctantly takes his hands off of you and scoots over.{/n} "Ah, that's a shame, then... All right — friends it is then!"
"Have fun!"
"Exactly... All right, boys, let's go — I can't wait!"
"Why not? What are we playing for?"
"For our clothes, ha ha ha!"
{n}Giggling, Octavia playfully slaps Regongar upside the head. In return the half-orc bares his fangs in a broad grin and starts dealing cards.{/n}
"Reg, that's the sixth game in a row you've lost! Do you even know how to play at all?"
"Not at all!" {n}The half-orc scoots closer to you and, as if by accident, puts his hand on your thigh.{/n} "But I'm a spectacular undresser…"
